title: Github Profile
description: This challenge is a great to practice working with multiple API endpoints in one application. The challenge is to create a simple QA quote generator application that requires you to use external library.

userStories.content: Create a QA code generator app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add inputs, images, buttons,.. according to the design.
Users should be able to search for user by user name.
User should be able to see number of followers, following and location.
User should be able to see the repositories that profile has.
User should be able to see the details of each repositories.
When users select repository card, they should be able see the repository page in the new tab.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
